headline: Southwest Airlines (LUV): Has the Recent 3-Month Rally Stretched Its Valuation?
summary: Southwest Airlines (LUV) has quietly climbed about 24% over the past month and nearly 30% in the past 3 months, catching investors attention as travel demand and profitability trends slowly improve. See our latest analysis for Southwest Airlines. That surge comes after a tough few years for airlines, and Southwest’s recent double digit 3 month share price return sits alongside a more modest 1 year total shareholder return, suggesting momentum is only now starting to rebuild.
